skins.shipDescription: J-class destroyer ` Juno, Hull Number F46!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the 4th ship of J class, Juno. Ow... My body isn't fine, so I have some small troubles, and I can't get used to fighting... But for Commander, I will work hard! So please don't be cold to me, alright?
skins.acquisition: Greetings, Commander. My name is Juno. Leave escort to me... I'll do my best!
skins.login: Commander, welcome back! I've already prepared the documents for use today.
skins.details: (Whispers) Commander, does... does this count as a medical check up?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Uh, that... it looks like Jersey wants to play with me...
skins.secretaryIdle2: What! ...Pasta...? Th-There's none. Can I decline?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, is there something I can do?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eh... C-Commander, please don't... look at that spot...

skins.shipDescription: I love the bustle of a Sakura festival! Commander, care to try some of Akashi's takoyaki? I've heard their taste is out of this world!
skins.acquisition: I love the bustle of a Sakura festival! Commander, care to try some of Akashi's takoyaki? I've heard their taste is out of this world!
skins.login: I already checked your schedule - there aren't any particularly important missions today! Hehe, now you can enjoy the summer festival without any worries, Commander!
skins.details: An in-inspection, now...? Um... I had a little too much to eat at the festival... Awawa! N-nevermind!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Umm, next time, we should invite Javelin to the festival... I'm sure she'll make things even more lively.
skins.secretaryIdle2: This festival has reminded me of how wonderful the Sakura Empire is. There's even so much good food~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Woah, the food over there looks so good as well... Huh, my figure...? Uu... Commander, what a meanie...
skins.secretaryTouch: This is a yukata, pretty cute, right? Hehe~ Awawa?! C-c-commander?!
